answers.author: Amanda Dodge
answers.text:
Hi Ronald,
Unfortunately we do not have any information about compliance regulations in Qatar. ICMA develops and advances professional local government management to create sustainable communities worldwide. However, I would advise you to try contacting the Embassy of Qatar for more information specific to your question.
Best,
Amanda Dodge
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
202-962-3699
adodge@icma.org

author: RONALD Crasta
text:
I am looking for Regulatory Compliance, guide lines, laws etc to be adhered to by Investment Companies operating or doing business in Qatar & Oman. Apprecaite if any body can help urgently.
Many Thanks for your support & assistance
Ronald
title: Qatar compliance regulations for investment companies
